column5: Anyone have info on good fishing to partake in on the way home in July for smallies, eyes ect from Public landing just off 502 on "s" curves? Always wanted to check it out to see what swims there? Thanks, jim

Chat with Ed at Taylor's Cove . I would bet you could put it at his dock for a small fee and there are a lot of great spots for smallies a short boat ride from his dock. He will show the best places on a map.
